instructions: On your iPhone, open Google Photos . Tap and hold to select the photos you wish to share. Tap Share , then select the contact you want to send the images to. To send a message with the photos, type it in the Say Something field. When you're ready to send the photos, tap Send . Your contact receives a notification on their Android device. Once they tap it, they see your shared photos and can choose to add them to their Google Photos library. They can also reply to your message and send photos.
